titles.title: Judge Damon Keith Congressional Gold Medal Act of 2019
Judge Damon Keith Congressional Gold Medal Act of 2019
A bill to posthumously award a Congressional Gold Medal to Judge Damon Jerome Keith.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
Judge Damon Keith Congressional Gold Medal Act of 2019
This bill directs Congress to arrange for the posthumous award of a Congressional Gold Medal in commemoration of the life and legacy of Judge Damon Keith, senior judge of the U.S. Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit.
